name: seventh
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A2 7th written as a word: It's the seventh (of May) today. Our team was/came seventh.
More examplesFewer examplesIn the seventh inning, the manager inserted Trammell as a pinch hitter .This is the seventh year in succession that they've won the cup.Since the championship began in 1987, they have finished successively in ninth, seventh and fifth position.

(in the position of) the number 7 in a series; 7th: Our team came in seventh. [ C ] It’s the seventh of May today.
A seventh is one of seven equal parts of something.
